news.headline: Paramount Extends Warner Bros. Discovery Tender Deadline
news.summary: Paramount extended the deadline on its tender offer for Warner Bros. Discovery to Feb. 20 and urged shareholders on Thursday to reject the latest offer from rival suitor Netflix.  The extension gives Paramount more time to court Warner shareholders with its $77.9 billion offer for the full company.  Warner said earlier this week that it had struck a new, all-cash deal with Netflix for its studios and HBO Max streaming service, valued at $72 billion.
